website_summaries.verdict: Blotting linens that are made of 100% natural abaca leaf fiber which is gentle on skin.
pros: Soaks up sweat without smearing makeup
cons: Linens are small compared to some other blotting papers on the market

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Up Your Oil Slick
customer_reviews.text: $10 for 100 sheets is kind of a lot but the good news is you only need one a day to really be effective. I am oily whether I wear makeup or not and the best thing about these sheets is that the makeup remains mostly undisturbed. I barely lay the sheet on top of my skin and come away with more oil than I think is there. I'd post a pic but I think everyone gets the point of blotting sheets. I subtracted one star because there are similar sheets available for less but I'm a fan of Boscia skin care products so it's an expected cost.
customer_reviews.author: hautemilkmami

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: In my 60s and still have oily skin--it drives me nutty! I tried blotting paper many years ago and wan't impressed. I ordered these blotting papers to round out my Subscribe and Save order and tried them today when I was looking pretty shiny. I used 6 or 7 of them to eliminate oil on every greasy square inch of my face and it worked! Not only did my face look oil-free, it felt oil-free to the touch! So, wow! (And extra thumbs up to boscia for keeping the blotting paper package plastic-free.)
customer_reviews.author: ebc_from_ct

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Before I tried these, I have always used the Clean & Clear blotters which aren’t paper or linen, they are a plastic sheet. These are actual linen, which is so much softer and feels much more like quality. The package is also well made. Nothing feels cheap, the box is sturdy (not thin, cheap paper) and the actual linens are thick, nicely sized, and leave skin oil/shine free without any residue left behind. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: sldiv

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these blotting papers. I have used many different kinds & all blotting papers are not created equal. I like them because they are larger than the regular size & they absorb the oil better than most blotting papers. I have very oily skin so I do use them a lot but I think they are worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Just try em’!
customer_reviews.text: How much can be said about it? Everything about these feels great. The blotting tissues feel good and absorb oil well, they haven’t ripped when removing them from the sleeve, and the sleeve itself has a kind of soft touch texture. I may stick with these, Boscia is a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful makeup buddy
customer_reviews.text: The sheets came in perfect and I'm using them mostly in the evenings after a full day of work. They absorb without an issue and are soft on my skin. So far these are the best sheets for me.
customer_reviews.author: SBM

customer_reviews.title: Essential For Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other blotters, but for me these are the best! As one other reviewer stated, they are worth the money if you have oily skin. I normally use one a day. I used to buy them in the mall but they stopped selling them and I was so glad to find them on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ILEANA D COLVIN

customer_reviews.title: Expected Better
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. Not the best blotting paper I’ve used. It’s weirdly thin despite its larger size, so I end up using just as much paper as a smaller size one. Also, because it’s so thin, it rips really easily. Will be going back to my other brand once I’m done, but at the rate I’m going, I may end up trashing this.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: I get a very oily nose and forehead throughout the day and these work GREAT! I use them before touching up my powder.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Huh?
customer_reviews.text: No idea who bought this or what for. Why would you blot green tea? As Forky would say. "I don't know"
customer_reviews.author: Prader

customer_reviews.title: Very soft sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand because the sheets feel like soft linen, not like the crunchy paper that other brands have.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: A must-have for oily skin. I don't know what I'd do without these. They remove oil without removing any of your makeup, unlike competitors that take off the makeup along with the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the packaging
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I was looking for, removes oil from my face without messing up my makeup!
customer_reviews.author: natxo

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I used to use the rice paper blotting sheets but these work so much better and they’re cheaper. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little blotting papers! Absorb oil quickly and I love the handy little packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Dang I'm oily
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how oily I was until I started using these. Yes, they take off the oil without taking off my makeup...but I have to use at least 3 or 4 sheets at a time. The oil on my face just soaks right through. I was pretty surprised at how small the sheets were. However, I do like using this product, it leaves my face feeling fresh
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as stated
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite face blotting linen, but I don't always purchase them due to the price. It's the only one large enough that I don't need to use more than one, so that does save money. My make up stays put and my oil is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie in FL

customer_reviews.title: winner!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great not only because of the price but also because of how well it works. I usually use in this on my t-zone area and it leaves my skin matte. When wearing makeup this product definitely comes in handy. It is small and fits inside a purse of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Steph P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wedding day. Definitely came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: NolesBrewer

customer_reviews.title: Effective blotting powder sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Used for touch ups during the day as needed. They work!
customer_reviews.author: PM212

customer_reviews.title: Very good price for the quality and quantity.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these blotting linens. My skin is unearthly oily, especially on my t-zone area. It is because of my oily skin that I have to use about four of these a day, so the quantity of the product is great. The best thing about these blotting linens is that it absorbs oil without disturbing my makeup, unlike one-ply generic tissue paper where you can obviously see the makeup residue being pulled off and onto the paper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly absorbent! Buy some more right now :)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: pricey but definitely a cut above
customer_reviews.text: These blotting papers cost double what other brands do but they are worth the price, in my opinion. They are bigger and more importantly, come out easily and individually just like Kleenex tissues. Very nicely designed little package.
customer_reviews.author: santasaur

customer_reviews.title: best blotting linen
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than Sephora. I'm a blotting addict. I get greasy by noon. I usually use two sheets at a time twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: They really smell like green tea it's amazing. Product was just as described new packaging and blots face oil great.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Morales

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the pretty little "case" that these come in, but unfortunately I always put them in the back pocket of my jeans before I go to school, so eventually the front part ripped off and most of the papers slide out and fell onto the floor. Other than that, these are handy for removing oil without smudging my concealer, and they smell good, too!
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Light duty. Good for touch-ups, or less oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: I like them -- but as someone with fairly oily skin, I would relegate these for event purse duty, when my make-up is fresh and a temperate indoor climate temperate is all my skin has had to endure. They're not as powdery as the old fashioned ones, and not as strong as the rubbery feeling sheets. That said, those varieties can be too much when only a little absorption is needed, so even for more oily skin like mine these serve a purpose -- but important to know what purpose they'll serve.
customer_reviews.author: searching out a Sputnik epitaph

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a must get. Takes the shine off your face, only problem is oil returns promptly! but no worries, just use another sheet! :)
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: These sheets do their job. They absorb the excess oil without any mineral oil. Also love the slight green tea scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Not that great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see where these were go great for the price. I saw some at Sally's Beauty Supply after that for $1.00 that worked just as well.
customer_reviews.author: FLBEACH BUM

customer_reviews.title: Fixes red oily skin
customer_reviews.text: These work SO well if you are prone to oil red skin. I used to keep a secret stash of these in my back pocket for hot summer days or nights out. I would use one in the bathroom and I would go from oily and red to having my skin look light and even toned again. I have mild rosacea but the green tea seems to do something magical for making my skin significantly less red. My friends who I let use them would rave about them too!
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Love it! But you can get it at Sephora for $10.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient and totally absorbs all oil and sweat and loose make up without any irritation even to the most sensitive skin in the world like mine!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Would buy again and again. Can sometimes tear one in half they are so large, so like getting 200.You won't be disappointed, they get rid of shine and have a very mild pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: These blotting sheets are great and work exactly as described. I use them to remove the sunscreen gloss from my face.
customer_reviews.author: Keeping it Real

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these for their large size and quantity. Great value, especially when compared to most other blotting sheets that are typically much smaller in size and count. These are a necessity for us gals with uber oily skin (I have to blot virtually every hour and a half). I also like that these sheets tend to lift more oil than make-up - always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: I Buy Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great product takes excess oil off without taking too much make up.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsis

customer_reviews.title: Great for special events
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wedding in case my girls and I got shiny in between pictures. I kept them in my emergency kit and sure enough we needed them and they worked great. Would definitely get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great for Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: I use about 2-3 sheets a day to get rid of excess oil on my face. It works well and I like that is has green tea. I've used cheaper blotting sheets in the past and they always smudged my foundation, but I haven't had any problems with the Boscia blotting sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Lt.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, blot don't wipe. Keeps make up on and removes oil. If you wip not blot the paper will easily tear.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like that after using these sheets I don't feel like my skin gets oilier after using them. Some sheets seem to make the problem worse. These do not bother my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Sarver

customer_reviews.title: Not so much!
customer_reviews.text: I was very eager to try these out after all the great review, but I was dissappointed that they are SO THIN. Otherwise, they work just fine. But I am not used to using about 3 of them at a time. I purchased the Palladio at Sephora several years ago, and they work so much better. They smell good, but they are just too thin to be helpful. Or maybe my complexion is so much more oilier than other people's, which is odd because I'm 61 years old. I am lucky to have this problem, I know.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Brazas

customer_reviews.title: wasted money - exxagerated description in real simple magazine - will not purchase again. ridiculous price for merchandise. amaz
customer_reviews.text: chose because of write up in real simple magazine - ridiculous price and worthless - no better than a pc. of typing paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lois G. Geddings

product_meta.title: boscia Green Tea Blotting Linens - Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Natural and Clean Skincare | Green Tea and Abaca Tree Fiber Oil Blotting Sheets for Face, 100 Sheets
product_meta.description:
boscia Natural and Vegan Oil Absorbing Sheets for Face. Say hello to shine-free skin with purse-friendly blotting linens formulated with Green Tea designed to soothe skin, absorb excess oil, and mattify complexion without budging makeup. The oil removing face sheets are formulated with Green Tea Extract and Abaca Tree Fiber. Green Tea Extract has natural antibacterial benefits and is a key antioxidant that soothes and protects skin from free radical damage. boscia's Green Tea Blotting Linens can also be used to blot off excess lipstick to leave a stained lip look. FEATURES: Removes excess oil and mattifies complexion. Travel-Friendly. Made for all skin types. Natural botanical ingredients. INGREDIENTS SPOTLIGHT: 100% Natural Abaca Tree Fiber, Green Tea Extract. HOW TO USE: Press individual sheet softly on shiny areas of the face. Repeat if necessary. Perfect for blotting lipstick as well. PACKAGE INCLUDES: Green Tea Blotting Linens – 100 Sheets

BRAND STORY
Plants are the secret to our skincare success. We're revolutionizing beauty routines around the world with products that are made for play and meant to be shared. Trust us, your skin wants in on the fun.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
